reviews.review: Game has few performance issues recently that never happened before regarding fps drop near fires with a lot of smoke particles or when using flashlight in dark areas-shadows to medium fixed flash light issue as for fires turning antialiasing off completely in game and overriding application with your gpu control panel antialiasing instead fixed the issue for me as for the game itself story and gameplay is interesting but nothing special just overall decent shooter if you're bored :)
Fun and has a lot to do recommended

Truly a classic gem; classic graphics, has a subtly challenging aspect, a very longer and sophisticated plot, and great soundtracks. Half-Life 2 is more entertaining to play with as not only does it let you re-experience how it feels to play Half-Life 1, but also, tests its own players for mostly how Valve has designed and developed their own engine and how the players are able to think in certain puzzles and situation at the same time. Although, still very long as it is, I still tend to speedrun this, despite it being complicated. 10/10

Half-Life 2 is a first person shooter that still holds it's weight today.

It's a classic for a reason. The level design takes you through various action and puzzle scenarios and has great pacing. Combined with that are different gameplay elements to play around with. There's different weapons, driving with a car and airboat, a gravity gun that can be used for map traversal and offensively to pick up sawblades and cut zombies in half, bug bait to control antlions and send them on your enemies and controlling AI allies. To top it all off, you have the mysterious story of Gordon Freeman.

For achievement hunters:
There's a few tricky challenges like not touching the sand and only using the gravity gun sawblades for killing and collectibles. There is also a chapter select.

This game is up there with the best first person shooter's I have ever played. Despite being some years old now, the game is incredibly fun to play. It's clear to see how this game influenced  so many other games, with many of the elements from this game standard in modern games. An absolute must!

Mi perfil entero lo dice por mi. Half Life 2 es, sin duda, un juegazo. 

Half Life 2 es, junto a su antecesor uno de los juegos (si no el juego) mas revolucionario en la industria del gaming. Un FPS √∫nico que, a pesar de sus mas de 10 a√±os, ha envejecido de maravilla. No solo por sus gr√°ficas, que son incre√≠bles a comparaci√≥n de otros productos estrenados el 2004. Al jugar Half Life 2, gozaras de escenarios bien dise√±ados, usualmente abiertos y llenos de detalles. No solo eso, pues estos escenarios est√°n repletos en vida y desaf√≠os para los jugadores, los cuales tendr√°n que enfrentarse a varios enemigos con un completo armamento que se ira recolectando por todo el gameplay. Ravenholm, Nova Prospekt o Ciudad 17, todos son escenarios donde se desarrollan las batallas de nosotros, el heroico Gordon Freeman. 

Soy consiente que este intento de "rese√±a" es corto, pero quer√≠a evitar Spoiler y no alargarme mucho para una rese√±a de Steam...

Al re pedo la Rese√±a, no hay nada que criticar de este juego. Fue un BOOM en su epoca, asi que nada, comento al pedo. Mientras les cuento que una ves cuando era chico fui a la verduleria y mi vieja me pidio que agarre 4 naranjas con buen color, 3 tomates bien rojos y 2 zanahorias. Yo como un boludo agarre 2 Naranjas, 3 Tomates y 5 Zanahorias (llege a mi casa y me recontra re cagaron a pi√±as hasta dejarme sangrando una semana entera con el ojo hinchado). Pero como dice el dicho, si la vida te da limones, haz limonada. Abrazo.

I might be a little blinded by nostalgia because I played Half life 2 on The Orange Box on my Ps3 back when I was like 8 years old, but when I replayed it recently it was still a lot of fun. And my god, it feels so much better to play with a mouse and keyboard than with a controller. I would say that the game still holds up pretty well. The Combine AI can be kinda dumb sometimes but it's nothing major. Half life 2 might just be one of my favorite shooters.

As is such with any entry in the series, Half Life 2 is definitely a game that still stacks up today in terms of quality of fun, story and generally feeling like a game that everyone could enjoy. It was very immersive and I definitely had fun playing it.
One problem I could say that the game has however is that for some reason not all of the maps have the shaders that they are supposed to. This leads to the affected parts of the game looking very bland and unfinished.
This problem may just be related to my copy of the game but either way I managed to solve it by downloading the necessary shaders from a third party source.
TL;DR: Game is fun but is missing map shaders
Half life 2 is a classic. Of course, it is not perfect, but I believe that every gamer must play it.
